mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff_info ( staffAccounts, staffPassword, staffName, storeId, roleId, staffMobile, joinTime, lastTime, staffState ) values( #{staffAccounts}, #{staffPassword}, #{staffName}, #{storeId}, #{roleId}, #{staffMobile}, NOW(), #{lastTime}, #{staffState} )
mapper.select: select id from staff_info where u_phone=#{uPhone} and u_state=1
select u_type from staff_info where u_phone=#{phone} and u_state=1
select id , u_phone , u_password from staff_info
